query:
SELECT u.id, u.openId, u.name, s.id as supplierId, s.companyName 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN suppliers s ON u.id = s.userId 
WHERE u.openId LIKE '%12@supplier.com%';
command:

FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN suppliers s ON u.id = s.userId
